UTILITIES
=========

![](https://cityofcombes.com/town-of-combes-municipal-complex.jpg)

### MISSION STATEMENT

To facilitate a high quality of life to all those who live, work in and visit the Town of Combes.

Town of Combes Utilities Department supplies water to the Combes population. This is achieved by building, operating and maintaining relevant structures and systems across Combes.

The Board Members approve the rates for water services. The board members also authorize rules and regulations related to the furnishing of water energy.

### PAY YOUR BILL

##### 

### GARBAGE COLLECTION

The Town of Combes manages efficient, hassle-free garbage collection services for Combes residents.

### BRUSH SCHEDULE

Please keep your front lawns free of any debris as indicated by the items on the lists below. Also, keep your brush and bulky items separately. Your brush should be no more than 8 feet long.

Service Guidelines - Help Us Keep Combes as Beautiful as Possible

We try our best to keep the Town of Combes as clean and beautiful as possible. You can help us by following the important service guidelines outlined below.

Kindly put all items at least 5 feet away from obstacles such as water/gas meters, telephone boxes, parked vehicles or overhead wires.

Also, please split up your brush and bulky item piles.

We appreciate your cooperation. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the brush schedule or service in general, feel free to contact us at (956) 423-2714

##### [Brush Calendar 2025](https://cityofcombes.com/content/pdfs/Combes-Brush-Calendar-2025.pdf)
